main event: A sighting of an orange-white star-shaped object in the sky over Atlanta, Georgia, observed by a local resident.
interesting points: The object hovered for about 5 minutes before descending,It was described as too bright to be an aircraft light by the observer,An aircraft (DC-6) flew over during the sighting but did not affect the object's flight path,Multiple witnesses in the area reported seeing a similar object,The sighting occurred around the time of a scheduled weather balloon release.
witness description: A technical writer for Delta Airlines and his wife, familiar with various aircraft types.
